abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

abilities.name: Fusion Cannons
abilities.description: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air. Uses a resource meter that recharges automatically when not in use.

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Micro Missles
abilities.description: D.Va fires a barrage of small rockets that detonate on impact, dealing splash damage to both herself and her enemies in a limited radius around each explosion

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents. Damage falls off the further you are from the center.

abilities.name: Light Gun (Pilot)
abilities.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Call Mech (Pilot)
abilities.description: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.

abilities.name: The Best Defense...
abilities.description: Doomfist generates temporary personal shields when he deals ability damage.

abilities.name: Hand Cannon
abilities.description: Doomfist fires a short-range burst from the knuckles of his fist. Its ammunition is automatically regenerated over a short time.

abilities.name: Rocket Punch
abilities.description: After charging up, Doomfist lunges forward and knocks an enemy back, dealing additional damage if they impact a wall.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps forward and smashes into the ground.

abilities.name: Power Block
abilities.description: Protect yourself from frontal attacks. Taking 25 damage empowers the next Rocket Punch and immediately resets its cooldown (100 mitigated = 125 incoming = 25 hp lost).

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Doomfist leaps into the sky, then crashes to the ground, dealing significant damage. Doomfist is invincible during his ultimate, and speeds up cooldown rate of his abilities by 100% while in the air. Empowers Rocket Punch on landing.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: All wound damage that Junker Queen does causes her to heal herself at an increased rate. Adrenaline Rush instantly heals for the remaining wound damage when an enemy dies with wounds on them.

abilities.name: Scattergun
abilities.description: Pump action shotgun. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Jagged Blade
abilities.description:
Active: Throws a blade in an arc. Re-activate ability to recall. If it sticks to an enemy, the enemy will be pulled back when the blade returns. Damages enemies in both directions.
Passive: Quick Melee wounds enemies, dealing damage over time

abilities.name: Commanding Shout
abilities.description: Grants temporary health and movement speed to yourself and nearby allies.

abilities.name: Carnage
abilities.description: Swing your axe to wound all enemies in front of you, dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Charge forward. Wounds enemies, dealing damage over time and preventing them from being healed.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Gain temporary health when dealing critical damage.

abilities.name: Incendiary Chaingun
abilities.description: Automatic weapon that ignites enemies on repeated impacts. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Volatile Chaingun
abilities.description: Automatic weapon that deals critical damage to burning enemies. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Overrun
abilities.description: Charge forward to stomp an launch enemies. You are unstoppable while charging.

abilities.name: Cardiac Overdrive
abilities.description: Mauga and nearby allies take reduced damage and heal by dealing damage. Allies receive only half the effect.

abilities.name: Cage Fight
abilities.description: Deploy a barrier that traps yourself and enemies. Automatically reloads Mauga's Chainguns at the start of the ultimate.

abilities.name: Fusion Driver
abilities.description: Automatic heat-based weapon. Deals more damage at closer range.

abilities.name: Energy Javelin
abilities.description: Launch your javelin at an enemy to stun and knock them back. More effective if the enemy hits a wall.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.description: Gain temporary health, reducing all damage taken and becoming unstoppable. While unstoppable, Orisa is immune to critical damage (headshots) as well as movement-imparing effects.

abilities.name: Javelin Spin
abilities.description: Spin your javelin to destroy projectiles and block melee attacks, while also pushing enemies and increasing forward speed.

abilities.name: Terra Surge
abilities.description: Sweep in enemies and anchor down, gaining the effects of Fortify and charging up a surge of damage. Press again to unleash the surge early.

abilities.name: Void Accelerator
abilities.description: Fire a stream of projectiles in a fixed pattern.

abilities.name: Void Barrier
abilities.description: Create a barrier at the targeted location.

abilities.name: Nemesis Form
abilities.description: Transform into Nemesis Form, changing your attacks and gaining bonus armor.

abilities.name: Pummel
abilities.description: Punch forward, creating a wave of energy that pierces all enemies and barriers in its path.

abilities.name: Block
abilities.description: Significantly reduces damage taken from the front and reduces movement speed.

abilities.name: Ravenous Vortex
abilities.description: Fire a nano ball, which explodes when it hits the ground, spreading a damaging field. Affected enemies are slowed and pulled downward.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: Enter Nemesis Form and create a deadly swarm that lashes out at nearby enemies, persisting longer when damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Rocket Hammer
abilities.description: Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Barrier Field
abilities.description: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy shield, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Though Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the shield, he cannot attack while sustaining it.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Reinhardt propels himself forwards at significant speed but with reduced ability to turn. Charge ends after a period of time or when Reinhardt collides with a solid surface. The first enemy Reinhardt collides with during his charge is "pinned" to Reinhardt, and is dealt heavy damage if Reinhardt then impacts a solid surface. All other enemies are knocked away from him.

abilities.name: Fire Strike
abilities.description: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.

abilities.name: Earthshatter
abilities.description: Reinhardt forcefully slams his rocket hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.

abilities.name: Scrap Gun
abilities.description: Roadhog's Scrap Gun fires short-range blasts of pellets with a wide spread, and a shrapnel volley in the center with a smaller spread. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Take a Breather
abilities.description: Roadhog heals himself and reduces damage taken.

abilities.name: Chain Hook
abilities.description: Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range.

abilities.name: Pig Pen
abilities.description: Launch a trap that slows and damages nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Whole Hog
abilities.description: After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Hyperspheres
abilities.description: Sigma launches two gravitic charges, which bounce off walls and implode after a short duration, damaging enemies within a sizable radius. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Experimental Barrier
abilities.description: Sigma propels a floating barrier to a location of his choosing. He can dismiss the barrier at any time.

abilities.name: Kinetic Grasp
abilities.description: Sigma freezes incoming projectiles in midair, converting them into shields.

abilities.name: Accretion
abilities.description: Sigma gathers a mass of debris and flings it at an enemy to knock them down.

abilities.name: Gravitic Flux
abilities.description: Unleashing his full powers, Sigma takes flight, lifts enemies in a targeted area, and launches them into the sky before slamming them back down. Those affected by the slam experience high gravity and are massively slowed.

abilities.name: Tesla Cannon
abilities.description: Winston’s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger. Ignores armor damage reduction. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Tesla Cannon (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Winston's weapon charges up then fires a medium-range electric beam. Ignores armor damage reduction. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Jump Pack
abilities.description: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

abilities.name: Barrier Projector
abilities.description: Winston’s barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.description: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

abilities.name: Quad Cannons
abilities.description: Automatic Assault Weapons. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Grappling Claw
abilities.description: Launch a grappling claw to rapidly swing around the area or pull yourself towards the anchor point. Enables high speed collisions to damage and knockback enemies.

abilities.name: Roll
abilities.description: Transform into a ball and increase maximum movement speed. Automatically reloads Quad Cannons after a short time in this form.

abilities.name: Adaptive Shield
abilities.description: Create temporary personal shields. Amount increases with more enemies nearby. Reactivate to redistribute overhealth to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Piledriver
abilities.description: Slam into the ground to damage and launch enemies upward.

abilities.name: Minefield
abilities.description: Deploy a massive field of proximity mines

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Damage blocked increases Particle Cannon damage.

abilities.name: Particle Cannon
abilities.description: Zarya’s mighty Particle Cannon unleashes a short-range beam of destructive energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Particle Cannon (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Alternatively, Zarya can lob an explosive charge to strike multiple opponents. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Particle Barrier
abilities.description: The Particle Cannon can emit a personal barrier that shields Zarya against incoming damage and debuffs, redirecting their energy to enhance her weapon’s damage and the width of its beam. The barrier, although only has 200 hit points, will absorb all of one burst damage even if it's higher than 200. For example, Tracer's ult will be completely absorbed even if it does 400 damage.

abilities.name: Projected Barrier
abilities.description: Zarya surrounds one of her teammates with an energy barrier that simultaneously absorbs fire and boosts the power of her Particle Cannon. Functions identical to Particle Barrier.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Zarya launches a gravity bomb that draws in enemy combatants and deals damage while they’re trapped. Disables movement abilities such as Tracer's Blink.

abilities.name: The Viper
abilities.description: Ashe’s semi-automatic rifle fires quick shots. Can headshot.

abilities.name: The Viper (Scoped)
abilities.description: She can also aim down sights for a more damaging, precise shot, but at slower fire rate and movement speed. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Coach Gun
abilities.description: Ashe blasts enemies in front of her, knocking them away and propelling herself backward for added mobility.

abilities.name: Dynamite
abilities.description: Ashe throws an explosive that detonates after a short delay or immediately when shot. The explosion from Dynamite also lights enemies on fire, dealing damage over time. Self damage is halved.

abilities.name: B.O.B.
abilities.description: Ashe summons her trusted omnic sidekick, Bob, who charges forward and knocks enemies into the air, then lays down suppressing fire with his arm cannons. Prioritizes enemy targets that Ashe damages with her rifle. Bob has the Tank role passive.

abilities.name: Ironclad
abilities.description: Reduce damage taken while transformed.

abilities.name: Configuration: Recon
abilities.description: In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Configuration: Assault
abilities.description: A slow-moving tank with a powerful rotary cannon. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: A-36 Tactical Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a bomb that bounces off walls and explodes when it impacts enemies or the ground.

abilities.name: Reconfigure
abilities.description: Bastion transforms between its two primary combat modes to adapt to changing battlefield conditions.

abilities.name: Configuration: Artillery
abilities.description: Become immobile and fire up to 3 powerful artillery shells.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: Cassidy fires off a round from his trusty six-shooter.

abilities.name: Fan the Hammer
abilities.description: He can fan the Peacekeeper’s hammer to swiftly unload the entire cylinder.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.description: Cassidy dives in the direction he’s moving, effortlessly reloading his Peacekeeper in the process.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: Hinder enemies in front of you, slowing them and preventing them from using movement abilities.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: Cassidy takes a few precious moments to aim; when he’s ready to fire, he shoots every enemy in his line of sight. The weaker his targets are, the faster he’ll line up a killshot. Deadeye replenishes Peacekeeper's ammo afterwards.

abilities.name: Glide
abilities.description: Echo can glide while falling.

abilities.name: Tri-Shot
abilities.description: Echo fires 3 shots at once, in a triangle pattern. All pellets can headshot.

abilities.name: Sticky Bombs
abilities.description: Echo fires a volley of sticky bombs that detonate after a delay.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Echo surges forward quickly, then can fly freely.

abilities.name: Focusing Beam
abilities.description: Echo channels a beam for a few seconds, dealing very high damage to targets with less than half health.

abilities.name: Duplicate
abilities.description:
Echo duplicates a targeted enemy hero and gains use of their abilities.
 - Echo's HP instantly becomes the full base HP of her target.
 - While duplicating, Echo charges her ultimate ability faster.
 - When the duration ends, or if Echo's HP is reduced to 1, Echo reverts back to normal and her HP returns to the HP she had prior to activating the ability.
 - Reverting back to Echo interrupts whatever ability she was using.

abilities.name: Cyber-Agility
abilities.description: Thanks to his cybernetic abilities, Genji can climb walls and perform jumps in mid-air.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Genji looses three deadly throwing stars in quick succession.

abilities.name: Fan of Blades
abilities.description: Alternatively, he can throw three shuriken in a wider spread.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Genji dashes in the direction of the cursor, dealing damage to every enemy he passes through. The cooldown is refreshed if he kills someone.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: While the ability is active, any frontal ranged attack will be deflected in the direction of Genji's crosshairs. Using Swift Strike or Dragonblade will cancel Deflect.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Genji brandishes his katana for a brief period of time. Until he sheathes his sword, Genji can deliver killing strikes to any targets within his reach.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Hanzo can climb any vertical surface.

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Press jump while in the air to leap horizontally

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Hanzo nocks and fires an arrow at his target. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Hanzo launches an arrow that contains a sonar tracking device. Any enemy within its detection radius is visibly marked, making them easier for Hanzo and his allies to hunt down. Arrow itself does the same damage as Storm Bow, and can also headshot.

abilities.name: Storm Arrows
abilities.description: Hanzo’s next several arrows fire instantly, and can richochet once, but at reduced damage. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike
abilities.description: Hanzo summons a Spirit Dragon which travels through the air in a line. It passes through walls in its way, devouring any enemies it encounters.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Junkrat's deranged sense of humor persists past his death. If killed, he drops several live grenades.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Junkrat's Frag Launcher lobs grenades a significant distance. They bounce to reach their destination, and blow up when they strike an enemy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: After placing one of his homemade Concussion Mines, Junkrat can trigger it to damage enemies and send them flying... or propel himself through the air.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Junkrat tosses out a giant, metal-toothed trap. Should an enemy wander too close to the trap, it clamps on, injuring and immobilizing them.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Junkrat revs up a motorized tire bomb and sends it rolling across the battlefield, climbing over walls and obstacles. He can remotely detonate the RIP-Tire to deal serious damage to enemies caught in the blast, or just wait for it to explode on its own.

abilities.name: Endothermic Blaster
abilities.description: Mei’s blaster unleashes a concentrated, short-range stream of frost that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Icicle
abilities.description: Mei can also use her blaster to shoot icicle-like projectiles at medium range.

abilities.name: Cryo-Freeze
abilities.description: Mei instantly surrounds herself with a block of thick ice. She heals, restores ammo, and ignores damage while encased, but cannot move or use abilities.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Mei generates an enormous ice wall that obstructs lines of sight, stops movement, and blocks attacks.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Mei deploys a weather-modification drone that emits gusts of wind and snow in a wide area. Enemies caught in the blizzard are slowed and take damage; those who linger too long are frozen solid.

abilities.name: Hover Jets
abilities.description: Hold to hover. Uses a resource meter that recharges automatically while landed. Can be activated without fuel to slow your descent.

abilities.name: Rocket Launcher
abilities.description: Pharah’s primary weapon launches rockets that deal significant damage in a wide blast radius.

abilities.name: Jet Dash
abilities.description: Provides a quick horizontal boost in the direction Pharah is moving. If Pharah is stationary, she will be boosted in the direction she is facing.

abilities.name: Jump Jet
abilities.description: Propelled by her suit’s thrusters, Pharah soars high into the air. Restores Hover Jets fuel and can briefly overfill the maximum fuel amount

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Pharah looses a wrist rocket that knocks back any enemies it strikes.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: The rockets cover a large area in the direction of the player's crosshair. The player must remain stationary while the ability is active. Instantly refills Hover Jets fuel.

abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.description: Regains a portion of all damage done to heroes as health

abilities.name: Hellfire Shotguns
abilities.description: Reaper tears enemies apart with twin shotguns.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities. Cannot be activated while affected by mobility-locking effects.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location. Reaper is invisible while exiting

abilities.name: Death Blossom
abilities.description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both hellfire shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Railgun
abilities.description: Rapid firing projectiles that generate energy on hit. Headshots grant double energy.

abilities.name: Railgun (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: High impact shot that consumes stored energy and pierces enemies.

abilities.name: Power Slide
abilities.description: Ground slide that can cancel into a high jump.

abilities.name: Disruptor Shot
abilities.description: Launch an energy burst that deals damage to enemies within it.

abilities.name: Overclock
abilities.description: Railgun energy auto-charges for a short duration.

abilities.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
abilities.description: Soldier: 76’s rifle remains particularly steady while unloading fully-automatic pulse fire. It takes 9 shots to reach maximum bullet spread. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Helix Rockets
abilities.description: Tiny rockets spiral out of Soldier: 76’s Pulse Rifle in a single burst. The rockets’ explosion damages enemies in a small radius.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Whether he needs to evade a firefight or get back into one, Soldier: 76 can rush ahead in a burst of speed. His sprint ends if he takes an action other than charging forward.

abilities.name: Biotic Field
abilities.description: Soldier: 76 plants a biotic emitter on the ground. Its energy projection restores health to 76 and any of his squadmates within the field.

abilities.name: Tactical Visor
abilities.description: Allows Soldier: 76's aim to home in on targets in a circle around his crosshairs and will switch targets if line of sight to the original target is interrupted. Using the ability also removes damage falloff and increases the reload speed of 76's Pulse Rifle while active.

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.description: Sombra deals more damage to hacked targets and detects critically injured enemies through walls.

abilities.name: Machine Pistol
abilities.description: Sombra’s fully-automatic machine pistol fires in a short-range spread.

abilities.name: Hack
abilities.description:
Hacking an enemy will interrupt any channeled effects (including ultimates) and prevent the activation of abilities, including a Hero's Passive. Hacked enemies also have their health bar and ultimate status revealed for a longer duration.
Hacked health packs respawn much faster (small health packs in 2.5 seconds, large health packs in 3.75 seconds), and can't be picked up by enemies.

abilities.name: Virus
abilities.description: Infect enemies with a projectile that deals damage over time. Virus damages hacked targets at a faster rate.

abilities.name: Translocator
abilities.description: Sombra throws a beacon and teleport to it. Become stealthed for a short duration after teleporting. Taking damage reveals Sombra briefly instead of ending stealth. Sombra cannot contest map objectives while stealthed.

abilities.name: EMP
abilities.description: Sombra discharges electromagnetic energy in a wide radius, destroying enemy barriers and shields and hacking all opponents caught in the blast.

abilities.name: Photon Projector
abilities.description: Symmetra’s weapon emits a ranged beam. It deals continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected, and constantly supply Symmetra with ammo/shields when damaging a barrier or shield health. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Energy Ball
abilities.description: The projector can also release an explosive energy ball that deals high damage on contact. The longer Symmetra spent charging it, the more damage it deals. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Sentry Turret
abilities.description: Symmetra launches a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range, revealing them to allies. Up to 3 turrets can be built on the battlefield at once. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Teleporter
abilities.description: Symmetra places a temporary teleporter exit pad at a distance and connects it to a teleporter entry pad at her current location. Allies (and some of their abilities, such as Junkrat’s RIP-Tire) can travel from the entry pad to the exit pad instantly.

abilities.name: Photon Barrier
abilities.description: Symmetra deploys a massive energy barrier which prevents ranged attacks and is big enough to cut through the entire map.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun
abilities.description: Torbjörn fires a single arcing rivet. Turret targets enemy hit by primary fire. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Torbjörn ejects molten metal from his gun in a shotgun-like burst. Can headshot

abilities.name: Forge Hammer
abilities.description: This multipurpose hammer repairs turrets and, in a pinch, can also be used as a weapon. While Forge Hammer is equipped, Rivet Gun automatically reloads itself after a short period of time.

abilities.name: Deploy Turret
abilities.description: Torbjörn deploys a self-building turret which automatically tracks and attacks enemies. Turret cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Torbjörn gains additional extra health as well as improved attack, movement, and reload speed. Instantly restores 6 ammo upon activation.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Torbjörn creates pools of molten slag that deal massive, sustained damage (plus bonus damage to armor), and can prevent enemies from moving through key locations.

abilities.name: Pulse Pistols
abilities.description: Tracer rapid-fires both of her pistols.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Tracer zips horizontally through space in the direction she’s moving, and reappears several yards away. She stores up to three charges of the blink ability and generates more every few seconds.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Tracer bounds backward in time, returning her health and position on the map to precisely where they were a few seconds before.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Tracer lobs a large bomb that adheres to any surface or unfortunate opponent it lands on. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing high damage to all enemies within its blast radius.

abilities.name: Explorer's Resolve
abilities.description: Using abilities grants temporary shields.

abilities.name: Clobber
abilities.description: Quick melee deals more damage. Cannot be used during ultimate.

abilities.name: Smart Excavator
abilities.description: Launch a seismic charge that bursts after a short distance, knocking back enemies on hit. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Drill Dash
abilities.description: Dash forward while above or underground, pushing enemies back. The cooldown is accelerated while Venture remains burrowed underground.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Move underground and become invulnerable. Emerge to deal damage.

abilities.name: Tectonic Shock
abilities.description: Transforms Venture's weapon to send out damaging shockwaves through the ground, knocking up enemies hit along the way. The primary weapon's ammo is replenished upon transforming back.

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Sniper
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s versatile sniper rifle is ideal for scope-aimed shots at distant targets. 2.5x headshot multiplier (+0.5x compared to all other heros).

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss: Assault
abilities.description: Should targets close to medium range, the rifle can also be fired in fully-automatic mode. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.description: Widowmaker launches a grappling hook towards the location she’s aiming at – when the hook connects with a scalable surface, she’s quickly drawn towards it.

abilities.name: Venom Mine
abilities.description: Widowmaker adheres a swiftly-arming venom mine to nearly any surface. When a target wanders within range of the mine’s motion trigger, it explodes, delivering poison gas to any enemies in the vicinity.

abilities.name: Infra-Sight
abilities.description: Widowmaker’s recon visor allows her to see the heat signatures of her targets through walls and objects for a moderate amount of time. This enhanced vision is shared with her allies.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle
abilities.description: The Biotic Rifle shoots darts that will heal allied heroes or apply 0.9 second damage-over-time (DOT) to enemy units. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Biotic Rifle (Scope)
abilities.description: She can use the rifle’s scope to zoom in on targets and make highly accurate shots. The dart is a fast moving projectile if fired from the hip, and a hitscan shot if firing while scoped. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: After a short delay, Ana fires a fast moving dart from her sidearm. An enemy hit is stunned for a few seconds, but the effect is immediately broken if the target takes damage.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Ana tosses a biotic bomb that deals damage to enemies and heals allies in a small area of effect. Affected allies briefly receive increased healing from all sources, while enemies caught in the blast cannot be healed for a few moments.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: After Ana hits one of her allies with a combat boost, they deal more damage and take less damage from enemies’ attacks.

abilities.name: Exo Boots
abilities.description: By first crouching, Baptiste can jump higher.

abilities.name: Biotic Launcher
abilities.description: Baptiste’s three-round-burst Biotic Launcher rewards accuracy and recoil control with significant damage output.

abilities.name: Biotic Launcher (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Biotic Launcher also doubles as a healing device, lobbing projectiles that heal allies near the point of impact.

abilities.name: Regenerative Burst
abilities.description: Baptiste activates an intense regenerative burst that heals himself and nearby allies instantly, with additional healing over time. Instant heal is doubled for targets less than half health.

abilities.name: Immortality Field
abilities.description: Baptiste uses a device to create a field that prevents allies from dying (any ally inside the field become immune to death, and their health cannot fall below a certain amount). The generator can be destroyed.

abilities.name: Amplification Matrix
abilities.description: Baptiste creates a matrix that increases the damage and healing effects of friendly projectiles that pass through it.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Dealing damage to enemies heals nearby allies. If triggered, there is a cooldown before it can be triggered again.

abilities.name: Rocket Flail
abilities.description: Brigitte's melee weapon has an extended range, enabling her to strike multiple enemies with a single swing. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Barrier Shield
abilities.description: Brigitte deploys a frontal energy barrier to absorb a limited amount of damage.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Once her Barrier Shield is deployed, Brigitte can dash forward to knock back an enemy.

abilities.name: Whip Shot
abilities.description: Brigitte throws her flail a long distance, dealing damage and knocking an enemy away from her. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Repair Pack
abilities.description: Brigitte throws a Repair Pack that heals an ally for a short duration.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.description: Brigitte moves faster and provides all nearby allies with overhealth. During Rally, Brigitte's basic abilities are enhanced. On activation, reset Shield Bash cooldown.

abilities.name: Solar Rifle
abilities.description: Long-range auto charging rifle.

abilities.name: Solar Rifle (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Medium range healing beam that consumes solar energy.

abilities.name: Outburst
abilities.description: Launches you in the direction you are moving. Knocking back enemies. Hold jump to go higher.

abilities.name: Healing Pylon
abilities.description: Deploy a pylon that heals allies.

abilities.name: Captive Sun
abilities.description: Fire an explosive ball of solar energy. Enemies hit are slowed and explode after taking significant damage.

abilities.name: Martian Overboots
abilities.description: While airborne, press Jump to double jump and hold Jump to hover.

abilities.name: Mediblaster
abilities.description: Burst fire weapon that heals allies and damages enemies.

abilities.name: Pulsar Torpedoes
abilities.description: Press Secondary Fire to lock on, then Primary Fire to fire homing projectiles. Heals allies over time and damages enemies.

abilities.name: Glide Boost
abilities.description: Glide horizontally with increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Hyper Ring
abilities.description: Deploy a ring that increases movement speed of allies that pass through it.

abilities.name: Orbital Ray
abilities.description: Call down a ray that travels forward, healing allies and increasing their damage.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Jump at walls to climb up them.

abilities.name: Healing Ofuda
abilities.description: Channel a burst of healing talismans that can seek targeted allies.

abilities.name: Kunai
abilities.description: Thrown projectile that deals increased critical damage.

abilities.name: Swift Step
abilities.description: Teleport directly to an ally, even through walls.

abilities.name: Protection Suzu
abilities.description: Throw a protective charm to make allies become briefly invulnerable and cleansed of most negative effects.

abilities.name: Kitsune Rush
abilities.description: Summon a fox spirit that rushes forward, accelerating the movement, attack speed, and cooldowns of allies that follow in its path.

abilities.name: Rejuvenating Dash
abilities.description: Dash towards your traveling direction and lightly heal yourself.

abilities.name: Healing Blossom
abilities.description: Hold to charge a healing burst. Release to heal a targeted ally. Passively charges at a reduced rate while not in use. Automatically reload after a 2.5 seconds when inactive.

abilities.name: Thorn Volley
abilities.description: Rapidly fire a spread of projectiles. Automatically reload after a 2.5 seconds when inactive.

abilities.name: Petal Platform
abilities.description: Throw a platform that springs upwards when stepped on.

abilities.name: Life Grip
abilities.description: Pull an ally to your location, protecting them as they travel.

abilities.name: Tree of Life
abilities.description: Place a tree that instantly heals allies upon sprouting and continues healing periodically as it lives.

abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: Jump onto a wall while holding space to ride along it. Lúcio receives a burst of speed when leaping off a wall.

abilities.name: Sonic Amplifier
abilities.description: Sonic projectile launcher. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Lúcio creates a short-range blast wave knock enemies away. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Lúcio continuously energizes himself — and nearby teammates within line-of-sight — with music. He can switch between two songs: one amplifies movement speed, while the other regenerates health. The switch can be done while reloading.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Lúcio increases the volume on his speakers, boosting the effects of his songs.

abilities.name: Sound Barrier
abilities.description: Protective waves radiate out from Lúcio’s Sonic Amplifier, briefly providing him and nearby allies with overhealth.

abilities.name: Sympathetic Recovery
abilities.description: Healing allies with Caduceus Staff heals you.

abilities.name: Angelic Descent
abilities.description: Propelled by her Valkyrie suit, Mercy slows the speed of her descent from great heights.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff
abilities.description: Mercy engages one of two beams that connect to an ally. By maintaining the beams, she can either restore that ally's health or increase the amount of damage they deal. Beams ignore barriers and will linger for a short duration if the target breaks line-of-sight or moves out of range.

abilities.name: Caduceus Blaster
abilities.description:
Mercy shoots a fast moving projectile from her sidearm. It's best reserved for emergency personal defense.
Can headshot.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Fly towards an ally. While in flight, Jump launches you forward, and Crouch launches you upward.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Mercy radiates restorative power, bringing nearby dead allies back into the fight with full health. Mercy is slowed significantly while performing resurrection.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description:
Valkyrie unleashes the full power of Mercy’s Valkyrie suit, enhancing her weapons and abilities for a limited duration.
 - Regeneration (Support Passive): Always active, uninterruptable
 - Hover: Mercy can now fly freely, at increased speed
 - Caduceus Staff: Increased output/range/chains nearby allies
 - Caduceus Blaster: ∞ ammo, increased projectile speed
 - Guardian Angel: Increased range and speed

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Renegeration
abilities.description: Using her left hand, Moira expends biotic energy (resource meter) to heal allies in front of her. Causes a residual heal over time that begins upon the last application of the spray healing. This allows Moira to heal without expending resources. Biotic energy passively regenerates when not in use.

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp: Decay
abilities.description: Her right hand fires a long-range beam weapon that saps enemies’ health, healing Moira and replenishing her biotic energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Disappear, move faster, jump higher, and become invulnerable, but you cannot shoot. Cannot be activated while affected by mobility-locking effects.

abilities.name: Biotic Orb
abilities.description: Moira launches a rebounding biotic sphere; she can choose between a regeneration effect that heals the allies it passes through, or a decay effect that deals damage to enemies. Dealing damage with Biotic Orb restores a small amount of Biotic Energy. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: Moira channels a long-range beam that both heals allies and bypasses barriers to damage her enemies. While channeling this ability, Moira's movement speed increases greatly, but she cannot perform any other actions. Moira's resource generation for Biotic Grasp is 3 times higher while channeling Coalescence. Cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Snap Kick
abilities.description: Quick melee damage increased, and its knockback is significantly increased.

abilities.name: Orb of Destruction
abilities.description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs individually. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Orb Volley
abilities.description: Zenyatta projects his destructive energy orbs in a rapid-fire volley after a few seconds spent gathering power. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Orb of Harmony
abilities.description: Zenyatta casts an orb over the shoulder of a targeted ally. So long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight, the orb slowly restores health to his ally. Only one ally can receive the orb's benefit at a time.

abilities.name: Orb of Discord
abilities.description: Attaching the orb of discord to an opponent amplifies the amount of damage they receive for as long as Zenyatta maintains line of sight. Only one opponent can suffer the orb's effects at a time.

abilities.name: Transcendence
abilities.description: Zenyatta enters a state of heightened existence for a short period of time. While transcendent, Zenyatta cannot use abilities or weapons, but is immune to damage and automatically restores his health and that of nearby allies.
